Class SKRouteAdvice

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.routing.SKRouteAdvice

public class SKRouteAdvice
extends java.lang.Object

Stores information about a route advice.

Version:
2.5

Nested Class Summary
static class SKRouteAdvice.SKFunctionalClasification
          The functional classification of a road is the class, or group, of roads that the road belongs to.

          Enum with all the directions of a road.
